name: windsurf-mvp
description: MVP tool to convert screen designs to HTML+Tailwind and generate HubSpot modules

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && PORT=3009 npm run dev
scripts.restart: lsof -ti:3000,3009 | xargs kill -9 2>/dev/null || true && sleep 1 && npm run dev
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && PORT=3009 npm run start
scripts.start:production: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "cd frontend && next start -p 3000"
scripts.clean: rm -rf backend/dist frontend/.next backend.log frontend.log backend-prod.log frontend-prod.log
